description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for viewing and interacting with a note. It manages loading, editing, deleting, and pinning a specific note, and constructs a UI to display note content.

classes.name: NoteViewScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that displays detailed view of a single note, with options to edit, delete, and toggle pin status.

classes.name: _NoteViewScreenState
classes.description: State class handling the logic for loading the note, managing UI state, and handling user interactions such as editing, deleting, and pinning.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers loading of the note data.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the note data by its ID using the note repository.

methods.name: _openEdit
methods.description: Navigates to the note editor screen for editing the current note.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the note via the provider and requests closing the view.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the note view, handling refreshes and navigation.
